author: cmpilato
msg: (install-javahl): Add javahl as a dependency for installing javahl. This
ensures building javahl before we install.

author: stsp
msg: Canonicalise URIs which have an empty hostname part correctly.
This fixes the crash described in #2116 ('svn log file:///'
(svn_path_canonicalize): We used to strip the trailing slash
of URIs with no hostname, e.g. http:// got canonicalised to http:/
(test_canonicalize): Add some test cases for the above.
This function used to complain about a missing hostname when
just passed "file://". But "file://" is the canonical version

author: firemeteor
msg: Make 'svn update' totally work for svn_depth_exclude. The next step will be a
(make_dir_baton): Permit to explicitly pull in excluded target.
(complete_directory): Similarly, clear the exclude flag in this situation.

author: arfrever
msg: * STATUS: Add r31722 to the r31425 group and vote for some revisions.

author: arfrever
msg: Define some definitions also on Windows.
Define SVN_HAVE_NEON when support for Neon is enabled.
Define SVN_HAVE_SERF when support for Serf is enabled.
